title: Land for sale in Kadawatha
details:
Land for Sale in the Kadawatha (Surigama - Ganemulla Road)
20 perches flat, square land
Developed peaceful residential area
Water and three phase electricity.
Entry/Exit carpeted road which is a by-road off to Kandy Road
Just 800 meters to kandy road
Only 5 minutes drive to kadawatha town and highway(Kadawatha - Colombo Outer Circular)
Bus route between Kadawatha and Ragama. Easy access to Ragama, Wattala, Gampaha and JaEla
Vlear deeds and approved plans
Please call only genuine buyers(NO BROKERS/AGENTS WILL BE ENETERTAINED)
Price negotiable
